group5.trackerexpress

Class Destination

  • java.lang.Object
    • group5.trackerexpress.Destination

  • public class Destination
extends java.lang.Object
    The Destination class holds all the necessary information for a complete destination
    Version:
    Part 4
    Author:
    Peter Crinklaw, Randy Hu, Parash Rahman, Jesse Emery, Sean Baergen, Rishi Barnwal
